summary: New textures for Stormshallows Sheep Modders Resource
descriptionHtml:
Gray, black and white texture versions of Stormshallows original Sheep Modders Resource.
The sheep models have changed UV-Mapping to fit the new textures.

I made [url=https://www.darkcreations.org/hoddminir/adding-a-new-creatures-to-skyrim]a guide[/url] on how to add new creatures to your game
(https://www.darkcreations.org/hoddminir/adding-a-new-creatures-to-skyrim)

You can download stormshallows original mod here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33273/?

If you use these textures please remember to give credit to me, and Stormshallows for the sheep models.
author: Elinen
